abstract: Pennsylvania Gov Tom Corbett signs a bill permitting him to place Harrisburg in receivership in an attempt to end a standoff in the financially troubled state capital.
snippet: Gov. Tom Corbett signed a bill permitting him to place Harrisburg in receivership, an attempt to end a standoff in the financially troubled capital.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Tom Corbett signed a bill permitting him to place Harrisburg in receivership, an attempt to end a standoff in the financially troubled capital.

headline.main: Governor Moves to Take Fiscal Control of Pennsylvania’s Capital
headline.print_headline: Governor Moves to Take Fiscal Control of Pennsylvania’s Capital
headline.seo: Governor Corbett of Pennsylvania Moves to Take Control of Harrisburg
